thread.title: New Zealand plans ultimate All Blacks ExperienceTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: New Zealand plans ultimate All Blacks ExperienceTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: New Zealand plans ultimate All Blacks ExperienceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New Zealand plans ultimate All Blacks Experience Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
In 2017 a unique new visitor attraction will open in Auckland, New Zealand. The All Blacks Experience will be an interactive destination showcasing the All Blacks and the game of rugby like never before.The state-of-the-art destination will be built on a prime site in Auckland’s waterfront Wynyard Quarter.
New Zealand Rugby Chief Executive Steve Tew said the attraction aimed to be an inspiring place for all New Zealanders and visitors to embrace New Zealand’s rugby heritage, traditions and culture.
“We are bringing together the stories of our rugby legends, the drama and excitement of test match rugby, and the magic and mastery of the All Blacks into a unique, world-class attraction on Auckland’s waterfront.
“This is will be a special place to enjoy a hands on, fully interactive experience of rugby; a place to celebrate the successes of all our national team; a place to be inspired and learn more about what it takes to succeed at the highest levels of the game.
“This will be an entertaining world class destination that will help visitors to New Zealand understand the part rugby plays in our national identity and how rugby is intertwined with our culture.
“Many tourists will never get a chance to see an All Blacks game. Many know the black jersey and the haka. All Blacks Experience will give them an exciting opportunity to get up close to these great symbols of our country, another place to create lasting memories of their time in New Zealand.”
Source:-Tourism New Zealand
